title: Pancakes and Feelings Club
description: The comfort show of the season. Being a teen is tough and comes with a lot of feelings. And those feelings go down better with pancakes.
quote: And in the end, weâ€™re all just different kinds of pancakes looking for a plate to call home.
creator: Devon Aaron Ennis
